data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I., Sääksjärvi, Ilari E., Bordera, Santiago (2015): Tersilochinae of Western Amazonia (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae). Genus Stethantyx Townes, part 2. Zootaxa 3981 (1): 95-106, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.1.4
